attributes.action: force oil companies not to store oil in tankers at sea (international national waters)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oil prices have increased mainly due to companies fixing prices by increasing oil reserve levels. This is mainly achieved by using supertankers filled to the brim, floating at high sea's. If oil companies are forced to release 80% of these reserves and keep it at acceptable levels prices will drop dramatically. We ask Prime minister to act on this, with international community.
